thread.title: Iconic ex-Ghana star Tony Yeboah vows to help Leeds United secure English top-flight qualification
thread.title_full: Iconic ex-Ghana star Tony Yeboah vows to help Leeds United secure English top-flight qualification

title: Iconic ex-Ghana star Tony Yeboah vows to help Leeds United secure English top-flight qualification
text:
Sports News | 23 October 2015 19:40 CET Iconic ex-Ghana star Tony Yeboah vows to help Leeds United secure English top-flight qualification - www.ghanasoccernet.com Tony Yeboah 
Ghana legend Tony Yeboah believes something drastic must be done to overturn the dwindling fortunes of Leeds United, insisting Elland Road deserve top-flight English football action. 
Leeds have struggled to return to the English Premier League since they suffered relegation in 2004. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
